name: Divine Comedy (scoopdiddywhoop, minchuk, Liss1024, yana2000)
description:
Descend into the depths of hell in this top-down hack and slash game.

Game's version 0.1.
Made for LD48 game jam.

Important:

Ludum Dare rules are a little bit vague, so we want to make it clear: The second version was made day after the game jam, but we did not change the gameplay mechanics or/and visuals, sounds, etc. It is simply code fixes and stuff as such. If you download patched version you will get exactly the same experience as the initial version, but less bugged. We left two downloadables for you to judge.

Enjoy :)

Made by:

Liss1024 - Lead programming

Yana Rogova - Cinematics, Level design

Min4uk - Level design

D.Fix - Sound design

Anthon Chuprov - Sound design

Skoopidy - Gamedesign

Anna Rogaleva - Voice acting

Lincheslav - 3D lead
